mapper.select: select id, stage, stage_date, stage_num, stage_index, open_number, pre3_number, pre2_number, number1, number2, number3, number4, number5, curr_continued_in_count, curr_continued_out_count, curr_continued_inclined_count, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_open_number where id = #{id} limit 1

select id, stage, stage_date, stage_num, stage_index, open_number, pre3_number, pre2_number, number1, number2, number3, number4, number5, curr_continued_in_count, curr_continued_out_count, curr_continued_inclined_count, create_time, update_time from yjcycc_lottery.bs_open_number where id = #{id} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into yjcycc_lottery.bs_open_number(stage, stage_date, stage_num, stage_index, open_number, pre3_number, pre2_number, number1, number2, number3, number4, number5, curr_continued_in_count, curr_continued_out_count, curr_continued_inclined_count, create_time, update_time) values (#{stage}, #{stageDate}, #{stageNum}, #{stageIndex}, #{openNumber}, #{pre3Number}, #{pre2Number}, #{number1}, #{number2}, #{number3}, #{number4}, #{number5}, #{currContinuedInCount}, #{currContinuedOutCount}, #{currContinuedInclinedCount}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update yjcycc_lottery.bs_open_number
stage = #{stage},
stage_date = #{stageDate},
stage_num = #{stageNum},
stage_index = #{stageIndex},
open_number = #{openNumber},
pre3_number = #{pre3Number},
pre2_number = #{pre2Number},
number1 = #{number1},
number2 = #{number2},
number3 = #{number3},
number4 = #{number4},
number5 = #{number5},
curr_continued_in_count = #{currContinuedInCount},
curr_continued_out_count = #{currContinuedOutCount},
curr_continued_inclined_count = #{currContinuedInclinedCount},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from yjcycc_lottery.bs_open_number where id in (${ids})
